text: Wylie Talbot Gibbs (born 26 July 1922) is an Australian politician and surgeon. He is a member of the Liberal Party. He served as a member of the House of Representatives for the Division of Bowman from 1963 to 1969. Gibbs grew up in Ipswich, Queensland. His brother, Harry, was Chief Justice of Australia from 1981 to 1987. From 1947 until her death in 2015, he was married to Audrey Wald. The couple had eight children. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:Living people Category:Australian medical doctors Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Members of the Australian House of Representatives Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: Wylie Gibbs
